dialogueLines.line: Oh, Sweetie. I didn't expect you to come here.
dialogueLines.speaker: dad

dialogueLines.line: I just happened to be walking by and noticed you.
dialogueLines.speaker: mom

dialogueLines.line: I'm setting up the stage for another battle against that blue-haired pipsqueak.
dialogueLines.speaker: dad

dialogueLines.line: Oh? In that case, care for a practice session?
dialogueLines.speaker: mom
